alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 3:12AM PDT until March 24 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 AM PDT FRIDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Highest amounts above 2500 feet. * WHERE...Interior Humboldt county including Hwy 299 at Berry Summit and Lord Ellis Summit. * WHEN...From noon today to 8 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
